title: Tintin in America
description: Join Tintin and Snowy--the world's greatest adventurers--as they solve thrilling mysteries around the world!Tintin come to the U.S.A to clean up the mean streets of Chicago! Though he outsmarts a group of gangsters, one gets away. Tintin is hot on his trail, tracking him into the Wild West But in this foreign land full of tricks, traps, and obstacles, it seems like everyone is out to get him! Will Tintin learn who to trust, get to bottom of America's crime, and make it back home?
author: Hergé
